about_the_game:
A young man named Marcel goes to the mall with his older brother late one afternoon. While wandering around, he quickly finds himself in a bizarre version of the place he was just in. An odd entity in a dark hotel room fills him in on his situation, and it's not looking good -- Marcel has transported himself to an alternate reality, and he's got a long journey back home.

In Lobby Loitering, it's up to you to help Marcel return to his world by exploring the chain of odd hotels he gets transferred to. Help eccentric strangers with their daily problems, discover secrets and lore about the worlds you traverse, and get into plenty of places you shouldn't be in.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Notice: 
To varying degrees, characters make mention of suicidal thoughts, war, depression, drug use, murder, and sexual innuendos. A character is also drugged on screen, but this is done without sexual intent or mention of sex anywhere before or after.

Sexual innuendos are localized to side characters or easter eggs that do not need to be interacted with in order to proceed.

short_description: Have you ever felt like, in a single step, the world around you changed, and you didn't notice until it was too late? Explore a collection of alternate realities in an attempt to get Marcel back to the reality he belongs in.
